title: Pentagon may ask Biden to stay in Afghanistan past Aug 31, but won't retake Bagram to speed evacuations
content:
1. Pentagon may ask Biden to stay in Afghanistan past Aug 31, but won't retake Bagram to speed evacuations  Fox News
  2. Deadly firefight erupts at Kabul airport as evacuation chaos continues into second week  CNBC
  3. Afghan visa applicants told to stay away from Kabul airport as US races to meet exit deadline  CNN
  4. Liz Peek: Biden's epic Afghanistan debacle – here's what it means for the Dems' progressive agenda  Fox News
  5. Juan Williams: Biden is right on Afghanistan | TheHill  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米国防総省、バイデン氏に8月31日以降のアフガニスタン滞在を要請する可能性があるが、避難を早めるためにバグラムを奪還することはないだろう。
五角大楼可能要求拜登在8月31日之后继续留在阿富汗，但不会重新占领巴格拉姆以加快疏散速度
五角大樓可能要求拜登在8月31日之後繼續留在阿富汗，但不會重新佔領巴格拉姆以加快疏散速度
